price: 86. Una denbi dhaaf Aabbahay, wuxuu ka mid yahay kuwaa lunsane.
arabic: وَٱغۡفِرۡ لِأَبِيٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-igh'fir li-abī innahu kāna mina al-ḍālīna
